message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have. I'm asking for $15,000 for it. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $15,000 is really my bottom line.  I know this product will be a huge asset to you. How about we split the difference and call it $13,500?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position, but I am still unable to meet you at $13,500. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
